entry.title: State of the Budgie: 2022 In Review and Goals for 2023
entry.summary: 2022 was an incredible year for the Budgie Desktop and the Buddies of Budgie organization, with 2023 set to be even better. Let us dive into it in this special State of the Budgie to recap the happenings of 2022 and the goals for 2023.
